> "Bomb them a bit," he says into his comm-link to Havoc. He watches Havoc
> launch two bombs down at where Kracken and Grenade were, then turns around
> and fires several dozen shots at Jetstorm.

(They are burried under rocks, it would take hours to dig them up.)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Demolition aims at Blender, firing a few dozen shots from his several
machine guns.

Blender fell from the first few hits and ducked under the rest. He tried to
maneuver close to Demolition.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Base damage: The base suffered some damage, but it was pretty minimal...
